bibl.title: A Berichtigungsliste of Demotic Documents. Indexes of New and Rejected Readings
bibl.note: Complete the work on the first volume of the Berichtigungsliste of Demotic Documents [= Studia Demotica. VII. A; - B (2005)]. - Preface. - Errata in Parts A-B. - I. Indexes of New Readings. - II. Indexes of Rejected Readings. - III. Index of Inventory Numbers of the Texts Listed in Part B, p. 579-803.
bibl.seg: I. Hartmann & S.P. Vleeming, A Berichtigungsliste of Demotic Documents. Indexes of New and Rejected Readings = Studia Demotica. VII. C.
Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, Peeters, 2013, 8°, xiv-pp. 863-1133. ISBN 978-90-429-2900-5. €72.

Complete the work on the first volume of the Berichtigungsliste of Demotic Documents [= Studia Demotica. VII. A; - B (2005)]. - Preface. - Errata in Parts A-B. - I. Indexes of New Readings. - II. Indexes of Rejected Readings. - III. Index of Inventory Numbers of the Texts Listed in Part B, p. 579-803.
